decisions: Co-located test files (*.test.ts) and #[cfg(test)] mod tests in Rust
Shared test-helpers.ts with factory functions to reduce boilerplate
Rust git tests create real temp repositories for authentic integration
result.summary: Phase 8 Testing: 156 total tests (94 vitest + 62 Rust). All pass. Covers agent store (28 tests), agent API (14), session actions (5), project store (12), files store (11), terminal store (15), bootstrap (6), constants (3). Rust: sidecar protocol (16), git_helpers (12), tree (16), diff (6), status (4), greet (2). Parallelism with 5 concurrent agents tested.
